backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing music-related enhancements, affected files, and components for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining Valentine-themed color variables and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling sections, global music provider, persistent music controls, and the question journey overlay.
frontend/src/components/effects/Confetti: Canvas-like confetti animation using absolutely positioned DOM particles and requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/effects/Floating: Animated floating heart particles rendered via DOM updates and requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/effects/HeartExp: Creates and animates a burst of heart-shaped particles using manual DOM updates and requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sparkles: Generates looping sparkle animations across the screen by updating positioned divs each frame.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying year, heart icons, and a tracked link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/music/Background: Provides a global audio context for looping background music with controls for play, mute, pause, and resume.
frontend/src/components/music/Persistent: Displays floating music controls that allow resuming blocked audio and toggling mute state.
frontend/src/components/music/useBackgro: Custom hook that retrieves the background music context and enforces provider usage.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the main hero section with animated hearts, text content, a countdown, and a button that triggers a WhatsApp message.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveLet: Shows a styled love‑letter card containing title, body text, and signature from valentineContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/Memorie: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Questio: Implements an interactive step‑based question journey with moving buttons, music integration, visual effects, and a celebration sequence.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reasons: Displays a grid of cards listing reasons for love, each animated and sourced from valentineContent.
frontend/src/components/ValentinesCountd: Countdown component showing time until Valentine's Day or a celebration message.
frontend/src/content/valentineContent.ts: Contains all static Valentine’s Day text content including hero text, love letter, reasons list, and question flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using Internet Identity with React Query and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Provides a hook to control background audio playback, including play, pause, mute, and handling autoplay restrictions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling authentication, identity loading, login, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, reserved for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentinesCountdow: Tracks a live countdown to the next Valentine’s Day and flags when the day is being celebrated.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, fonts, color variables, and custom animation utilities for the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state with existing features, a pending request, and metadata for implementing global background music and controls. Lists four implemented features and one new feature request.
